Paper.Title: A NEW APPROACH TO TEXT UNDERSTANDING

Section.Paragraph: This paper first briefly describes the architecture of PLUM, BBN's text processing system, and then reports on some experiments evaluating the effectiveness of the design at the component level.
Three features are unusual in PLUM's architecture: a domain-independent deterrninistie parser, processing of (the resulting) fragments at the semantic and discourse level, and probabilistie models.
